name: TurtleSeed Dark Theme
description:
Work In Progress userstyle for the social media website http://turtleseed.com
Makes the website more dark for easier readability as well as replaces some icons.

If anyone has feedback on this or ideas on how to improve it then please email me at wolfenangel8@gmail.com and make the subject line "TurtleSeed Dark Theme Feedback".
additional_info:
v0.6.1

Update Notes v0.6.1:

Update to make Dark Theme (maybe) work on Mobile Web.
